bio: A passionate software developer with a focus on full-stack development, cybersecurity, and machine learning. I enjoy solving complex problems and creating innovative solutions. My skills span from application development to securing systems and leveraging data science.

certifications.title: AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty
certifications.description: Validates expertise in building, training, tuning, and deploying machine learning models on AWS Cloud.

certifications.title: GIAC Certified Incident Handler (GCIH)
certifications.description: Focuses on detecting, responding to, and resolving security incidents using real-world tools and techniques.

certifications.title: GIAC Security Essentials (GSEC)
certifications.description: Demonstrates hands-on knowledge of information security principles, including access control, cryptography, and network defense.

certifications.title: GIAC Foundational Cybersecurity Technologies (GFACT)
certifications.description: Covers core computing, networking, OS, and security fundamentals for entry-level cybersecurity professionals.

goals: My short-term goal is to contribute to a major open-source project. My long-term goal is to lead a team of talented developers and build innovative products.
